text:
property is set to an existing directory and is used in other tasks. The exact 
same line used to work in 1.5beta1, 1.5beta2, 1.4.1 and 1.6alpha

This doesn't work

	<target name="clean" description="clean up">
		<delete dir="${dir.export}"/>
	</target>

but this does

	<target name="init">
		<mkdir dir="${dir.export}"/>
	</target>


so the property isn't the problem
